Class Runtime

The PCR (Polite Common Runtime) used for caching and executing instructions in any Polite language.

Parser parser

The Parser to use for constructing Token trees.

Property Value
Type Description
Parser

RuntimeSettings

The bitfield used to reference the behaviour of a Variable at the time of interpretation. If this field is changed, you must repopulate the Instructions for settings to take effect. If no settings are provided, they default to mimic C#. See RuntimeSettings.

Declaration
public int RuntimeSettings { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Int32

VariableStack

The Stack containing every currently utilized Variable.
